thread.title: No service on Sheffield Supertram route after Storm Doris flooding
thread.title_full: No service on Sheffield Supertram route after Storm Doris flooding | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: No service on Sheffield Supertram route after Storm Doris flooding

organizations.name: travel hull sheffield york north yorkshire lincolnshire leeds south yorkshire east yorkshire west yorkshire north lincolnshire

text:
There is no service on the Sheffield Supertram between Sheffield Station and Hallam University and Gleadless Townend due to flooding at Spring Lane.
Last updated Thu 23 Feb 2017 Read more 7 updates Live updates: Storm Doris hits the region Travel Hull Sheffield York North Yorkshire Lincolnshire Leeds South Yorkshire East Yorkshire West Yorkshire North Lincolnshire
